tasks.name: Documentation
tasks.description: Prepare comprehensive documentation for the project, including user manuals and technical guides.

tasks.name: Finalize Project
tasks.description: Review all aspects of the project and prepare for the final release.

tasks.name: Complete Project Proposal
tasks.description: Draft a detailed project proposal outlining goals, scope, and deliverables.

tasks.name: Revise User Interface
tasks.description: Gather feedback on the prototype and make necessary revisions to the user interface.

tasks.name: Client Presentation
tasks.description: Prepare a presentation for the client showcasing the project progress and features.

tasks.name: Research Market Trends
tasks.description: Conduct market research to identify current trends and customer preferences.

tasks.name: Code Refactoring
tasks.description: Optimize and refactor existing codebase to improve performance and maintainability.

tasks.name: Develop Prototype
tasks.description: Create a prototype for the new product feature based on the research findings.

tasks.name: Quality Assurance Testing
tasks.description: Conduct thorough testing to ensure the product meets quality standards.

tasks.name: Project Kickoff
tasks.description: Hold a meeting to officially start the project.

tasks.name: Release Version 1.0
tasks.description: Publish the final version of the product.
